casebody.data:
West Hartford Education Association v. Dayson DeCourcy et al. Peter B. Sullivan and Bussell L. Post, Jr., in support of the motion. Peter B. Sullivan and Bussell L. Post, Jr., in support of the motion. Submitted March 23 decided March 30, 1971

Submitted March 25—decided March 30, 1971

The petition by W. Gary Vause on behalf of the Connecticut Association of Boards of Education, Inc., for leave to appear and file a brief as amicus curiae in the appeal from the Superior Court in Hartford County is granted to the extent of filing a brief.

The petition by Elihu Berman on behalf of the Connecticut Education Association, Inc., for leave to appear and file a brief as amicus curiae in the appeal from the Superior Court in Hartford County is granted to the extent of filing a brief.
